item.title: Yammer Mobile App Logon Scenarios
item.description: Yammer offers several different options when it comes to logging in so you can choose the one that’s best for your organization. As such, there are many different login flows you may see depending on which method is employed on your network. Below, I have detailed each of these flows so you can know what to expect for your configuration (note: Screenshots taken on iOS).
